document.full_text: a bomb went off outside a mosque in kashmir's main city friday, killing a prominent muslim cleric, police and witnesses said, the first such attack near a religious place in recent years.
document.title: bomb in indian kashmir kills prominent muslim cleric
lines_and_colors: a bomb went off outside a mosque in kashmir's main city friday, killing a prominent muslim cleric, police and witnesses said, the first such attack near a religious place in recent years.
